text:
May 26, 1952
Mr. Frank Schooley, Treasurer HASB,
University of Illinois,
Urbana, Illinois.
Dear Frank:
You will find enclosed the stubs and receipts that I failed to
attach to my SXP3NS3 ACCOUNT, which was mailed to you todey. Sorry I
overlooked sending them with my expense sheet for the Battle Creek, Michigan,
meeting.
Alvin M. Gaines,
Radio Station WAB3,
Atlanta, Georgia.
